column1: For Dog it is too cold. Cat gives Dog underwear. One pair of underwear is dirty. One pair of underwear is clean. Dog takes the clean underwear. But it is still too cold. Cat gives Dog shirts. One shirt is big. One shirt is small. Dog takes the big shirt. But it is still too cold. Cat gives Dog trousers. One pair of trousers is long. One pair of trousers is short. Dog takes the long pair of trousers. But it is still too cold. Cat gives Dog vests. One vest is wet
column2: one vest is dry. Dog takes the dry vest
column3: but it is still too cold. Cat gives Dog jackets. One jacket is thick
column4: one jacket is thin. Dog takes the thick jacket
column5: but it is still too cold. Cat gives Dog hats. One hat is high
column6: one hat is low. Dog takes the high hat
column7: but it is still too cold. Cat gives Dog shoes. One pair of shoes is new
column8: one pair of shoes is old.
